## ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams.lineFadeNear property

Distance to the camera (0.0 = nearPlane, 1.0 = farPlane) at which the object edges start fading out.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lineFadeNear?: DynamicProperty<number>;
```
